desc: do not index this column (in this particular mapping)
what does this mean: dont index this column - eg for measures with floats, or encrypted data

desc: only index strings which exist in project
what does this mean: get the key elements - this index is the HIGHEST lookup

desc: only index strings which already exist in aikif index (ie main things like projects, programs, events, contacts)
what does this mean: get any element already referred. So you need to run these indexes last. Also - this is the 2nd highest lookup
to catch all fact data - lowest lookup, used for full text search of programs, notes, wikis
